title: The Halftime Show Was At My House
itunes:title: The Halftime Show Was At My House
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m divorced and dating again. I have a special friend that is in a complicated marriage and I slipped up and had sex with him a few weeks ago. Since then, he has been hooked on me and he slides by my house whenever he can. We have unbelievable chemistry in the bedroom but I still try to keep everything in perspective because he is married and I know his wife.........................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
